notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was funded by the German Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ) in close collaboration with the Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH under the country study in Ethiopia as part of the project “AGRICA – Climate risk analyses for identifying and weighing adaptation strategies in sub-Saharan Africa”. Open Access funding enabled and organized by Projekt DEAL.
